episodesJson.title: Research needs and future training
episodesJson.description: This program focuses on medical research needs and future training. Guests are John H. Gibbon Jr. MD; Willis J. Potts, MD; Jerome T. Syverton, MD; John F. Enders, MD; Randall G. Sprague, MD; F.D.W. Lukens, MD; Julius L. Wilson, MD; and others.

contributor.name: Lukens, Francis D. W. (Francis Dring Wetherill), 1899-
